author: Hiroya Kubo <hiroya@cuc.ac.jp>
name: node-libpafe
preinstall: (cd deps/unix/libusb-1.0.18; ./configure --prefix=/tmp && make install && cp /tmp/include/libusb-1.0/libusb.h  /tmp/include; cp /tmp/lib/libusb.a /tmp/lib/libusb-1.0.a);(cd deps/unix/libpafe; ./configure; make ); node-gyp rebuild
